title: Rule 1 | Beyond Order: 12 More Rules for Life
description:
Beyond Order: 12 More Rules for Life is available for preorder at https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/beyond-order-12-more-rules-for-life

I have decided to make a video series for my new book Beyond Order: 12 More Rules for Life. Each of these 12 videos will present a rule as well as a paragraph from the chapter devoted to that rule. 

This video is the video for Rule 1: Do not carelessly denigrate social institutions or creative achievement.

Beyond Order: 12 More Rules for Life is available for preorder now and will be shipped on the publishing date, March 2, 2021.

You can purchase Beyond Order: 12 More Rules for Life at https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/beyond-order-12-more-rules-for-life
